main event: Mr. and Mrs. Carpenter observed a round, disc-shaped metallic object hovering silently in the sky before rapidly accelerating and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The object was described as having a metallic appearance.
The object hovered silently for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing.
No sound was heard during the observation.
The observation took place on July 7, 1968 in Caiton, Ohio.
The Headquarters of the Air Force sent a letter requesting the witness to complete a questionnaire for further investigation.
